The video was shared on Facebook on Marc: 2020, and has been viewed over 16,000 times.
The video shows a person mixing Zonrox: brand bleach with Tanduay rum, and a voice can be heard suggesting the addition of fabric softener to mask the smell.
Health experts and organizations: such as the Integrated Chemists of the Philippines (ICP) and the World Health Organization (WHO), have stated that the homemade mixture is not an effective hand sanitizer and can be potentially harmful.
The Philippine Food and Drug Administrat: s guidelines state that only duly authorized establishments and licensed retail drug outlets are allowed to prepare hand sanitizers.
